recipe.name: Salad: Betty Werre
recipe.preparation: 1.  Lettuce cut up - use the amount you need.2.  One large can shrimp3.  Cut up green onions (end and all)4.  One small can peas, drained5.  Avocado6.  Celery - cut up fine7.  Three hard boiled eggs - gratedPrepare lettuce, celery and onion ahead of time, add remaining ingredients when ready to serve.Coat with mayonnaise and toss when ready to serve.
